Christ the King Parish (CTK) is a Roman Catholic church situated in Las Piñas City, Metro Manila, Philippines. It was officially installed as a parish by His Eminence, the late Archbishop of Manila Jaime Cardinal Sin on June 5, 1979. The parish's territory presently belongs to the Diocese of Parañaque, having formerly been under the Archdiocese of Manila.
The parish is under the jurisdiction of the Diocese of Parañaque. The parish priest is Jason Bill C. Valeza since February 14, 2024.
